Detailed Description

mgSysGLList is a class to constrol system generated display list.

System generated display list means the display lists not generated from the document, m_group of the document. mgSysGLList returns a display list name when an mgSysGL(fucntion code, object id) is added(push_back, or push_front). Using the display list name, invoke glNewList(name, GL_COMPILE), ..., glEndList(). Then mgSysGLList will manage to delete the display list, giving the fucntion code or the object id.

make_RC_current() of MGOpenGLView is necessary to use. function's retrurn value is true if any one is deleted.
